title: [Large-Scale] Language Project Design Based on STEM Growth Mindset

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational STEM concepts and language education experience
context.additional_context: Capacity-building project for elementary teachers to apply STEM growth mindset principles to language education

learning_goals: Learners can apply the six core elements of growth mindset theory (challenge, persistence, effort, praise, others' success, learning goals) to project design.
Learners can develop one or more STEM growth mindset language education projects using smartphone-based collaboration tools.
Based on peer feedback, learners can identify and improve three or more fixed mindset-inducing elements in their project designs.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
